attributes.action: Stop cremation under Covid 19  by Sri Lankan Govt
attributes.additional_details: The UK govt has been standing up for freedom of religious rights and for the minorities liberties and oppose oppressions and support Fair Play.
attributes.background:
To request Govt of Sri Lanka to allow freedom of religious rites on 
deaths due to COVID 19 , Govt of Sri Lanka has taken exception to internationally considered normal by imposing  cremation on all covid 19 deaths, This is causing unprecedented pressure in the communities  and racially motivated.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the decisions of the Sri Lankan Government.
